about_the_game:
Hoton is a first-person psychological horror game.
The goal of the game is to get out alive from the labyrinth with puzzles and traps. To escape from different levels of rooms similar to a labyrinth, you will need to solve different puzzles.
You will have to explore every room, look for elements that will help you keep advancing throughout the game and discover new areas, but the further you go, the more dangerous it will be, you must pay close attention to the environment and avoid and run away from monsters if you want to survive .

content_descriptors.notes: This video game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, and may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content. Player discretion is advised.
